rules_text:
Fathom {G}{G}{G} [i](If you cast this by sacrificing a creature or Vehicle and paying the fathom cost reduced by that permanent’s mana value, put this onto the battlefield as a creature after it resolves or loses targets.)[/i]
Search your library for a green creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. If this spell was cast for its fathom cost, X is 1 plus the sacrificed permanent’s mana value.
